greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: floor((prime(n+1)-prime(n))/log(prime(n))).
comment: a(n) is unbounded by a theorem of Westzynthius. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 04 2015
link: Kevin Ford, Ben Green, Sergei Konyagin, James Maynard, and Terence Tao, Long gaps between primes (2014).
formula: Infinitely often a(n) >> log log n log log log log n/log log log n, see Ford-Green-Konyagin-Maynard-Tao. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 04 2015
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Apr 17 2003
